channel.title: Someone know a tut on how to add queen black dragon?

item.title: Someone know a tut on how to add queen black dragon?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Whackatre, post:4, topic:446118”][quote author=JCor9 link=topic=548979.msg4025200#msg4025200 date=1340292005]
No this isnt any tut about this yet… More and likly their wont be for about a month or so because servers that currntly have it wont release it
[/quote]

  1. Leech model off client.
  2. Leech NPC definitions off client.
  3. Copy and paste into your own client.
  4. Spawn NPC.
  5. Profit???[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Someone know a tut on how to add queen black dragon?
